name: Huffman Aviation, LLC
about: Huffman Aviation LLC, located in Burleson, Texas, is a medium-sized flight school renowned for its exceptional quality and personalized training. Owned and operated by Jake Huffman, a veteran pilot with over 20,000 hours of flight time, the school offers a wide range of training programs, including FAA Part 141 and VA-approved courses, as well as traditional Part 61 training. Huffman Aviation boasts a diverse fleet of aircraft, including two-seat single-engine trainers, four-seat cross-country planes, complex, high-performance, and twin-engine aircraft, all meticulously maintained by an in-house team of certified mechanics. With a flexible syllabus tailored to individual needs, Huffman Aviation provides high-quality instruction at reasonable prices, making it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots in the greater Dallas/Fort Worth area. Our dedicated staff is committed to ensuring each student receives the best possible training experience.
